description:
Remove fake glance client form nova/tests/image/test_glance.py

Testing using this client requires partial dependency injection support in the GlanceImageService constructor, with associated clutter. Additionally, it duplicates some of the code in nova/tests/api/openstack/fakes.py.
title: Remove fake glance client from nova/tests/image/test_glance.py

comments.content:
Remove fake glance client form nova/tests/image/test_glance.py

Testing using this client requires partial dependency injection support in the GlanceImageService constructor, with associated clutter. Additionally, it duplicates some of the code in nova/tests/api/openstack/fakes.py.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markwash

comments.content: I was supposed to assign this to Jay Pipes, and set the importance to Wishlist. However, I do not appear to have those permissions.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~markwash

comments.content: @Jay: are you currently working on that ? If not we should probably leave it unassigned to let other people have a try at fixing it...
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: Was fixed a long time ago.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
